title: [Large-scale] Designing a Mathematics Education Framework to Strengthen Computational Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and digital tool application proficiency
context.additional_context: Computational thinking education for professionals to solve real-life problems

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical problem-solving models utilizing the computational competency framework (Closeness, Embodied Learning, Design Process, Decoding)
Learners can implement and evaluate real-data-based mathematics projects using personalized devices (BYOD)
Learners can demonstrate computational literacy competencies in analyzing technology's societal impact
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
